name: In Five Colors Dyed
description:
Combat Action: When your active character is Chiori, equip this card.
After Chiori equips this card, immediately use Fluttering Hasode once.
When your Chiori, who has this equipped, uses Fluttering Hasode: Summon 1 additional Tranquilly Taking Ten Tamoto, and Select 1 of 4 Chiori's Automaton Dolls before also summoning it.
(You must have Chiori in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionraw:
$[K1]: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[A1609]</color>, equip this card.
After $[A1609] equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>$[S16092]</color> once.
When your $[A1609], who has this equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[S16092]</color>: Summon 1 additional <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116094]</color>, and $[K59] 1 of 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>$[C116097]</color> before also summoning it.
(You must have $[A1609] in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
descriptionreplaced:
<color=#FFFFFFFF>Combat Action</color>: When your active character is <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chiori</color>, equip this card.
After Chiori equips this card, immediately use <color=#FFD780FF>Fluttering Hasode</color> once.
When your Chiori, who has this equipped, uses <color=#FFFFFFFF>Fluttering Hasode</color>: Summon 1 additional <color=#FFFFFFFF>Tranquilly Taking Ten Tamoto</color>, and <color=#FFFFFFFF>Select</color> 1 of 4 <color=#FFFFFFFF>Chiori's Automaton Dolls</color> before also summoning it.
(You must have Chiori in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
source: Reward for inviting Chiori to a duel at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives
